Changing Attacks During Battle
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Battles: Changing Attacks During Battle
By Argos on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 03:20 pm:

hey, this is an idiotic question, but when you're in a battle, how the hell do you change the the attacks at a certain range??? Like if u have two attacks at the longest range, how do u switch between them???

-- Rockon, January 23, 2000



Answers

If your using the default buttons it is SQUARE to switch between
attacks.

-- The Man, January 23, 2000.
Response to This is a stupid question, but i lookedi n the archives for it

first use the R1 & L1 to get it on the move then use the squarebutton
to change between moves

-- grant, January 23, 2000.
Response to This is a stupid question, but i lookedi n the archives for it

Thanks! I had been going through the game without knowing that!!! =D
